dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: We're glad to have you here.

projects.title: Projects
projects.noProjectsDescription: Create your first project to get started

profilePage.title: Edit Profile
profilePage.subtitle: Update your profile information below. Changes will be saved to your account.
profilePage.usernameHelper: Your unique username (letters, numbers, underscores only)

errors.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to update profile

success.title: Profile updated
success.description: Your profile has been successfully updated.

avatar.label: Avatar
avatar.helper: Upload your profile picture. You can drag and drop an image or click to select.

cropDialog.title: Edit Avatar
cropDialog.description: Adjust the image to your liking. You can move and resize the selection area.

avatar.dropOrClick: Drop an image here or click to upload

errors.invalidFile: Please select a valid image file
errors.sizeTooLarge: Image size must be less than 5MB

email.label: Email
email.dialogDescription: Enter your new email address. A confirmation email will be sent to the new address.

errors.mustBeDifferent: New email must be different from current email

success.title: Email change requested
success.description: A confirmation email has been sent to {email}. Please check your inbox and click the confirmation link to complete the email change.

disconnectDialog.title: Disconnect Provider
disconnectDialog.description: Are you sure you want to disconnect {provider} from your account? You will no longer be able to sign in using this provider.

success.title: Provider disconnected
success.description: {provider} has been successfully disconnected from your account.

errors.title: Error disconnecting provider
errors.description: Failed to disconnect the provider. Please try again.

signOutDialog.title: Sign Out
signOutDialog.description: Are you sure you want to sign out? You will need to sign in again to access your account.

success.title: Signed out
success.description: You have been successfully signed out.

errors.title: Error signing out
errors.description: Failed to sign out. Please try again.

createProject.title: Create New Project
createProject.subtitle: Fill in the details below to create a new project
createProject.projectNameHelper: Enter a descriptive name for your project
createProject.projectKeyHelper: Short identifier (3-10 uppercase letters/numbers, e.g., PROJ, DEV)
createProject.descriptionHelper: Describe what this project is about (optional)

errors.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to create a project

editProject.title: Edit Project
editProject.subtitle: Update the project details below
editProject.projectNameHelper: Enter a descriptive name for your project
editProject.projectKeyHelper: Short identifier (3-10 uppercase letters/numbers, e.g., PROJ, DEV)
editProject.descriptionHelper: Describe what this project is about (optional)

errors.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to update a project
errors.noPermission: You do not have permission to edit this project

header.urlCopiedDescription: You can now share the ticket with others

notFound.title: Ticket not found
notFound.description: The ticket you are looking for does not exist.

comments.title: Comments
comments.noPermission: You don't have permission to comment on this ticket.
comments.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

success.linkCopiedDescription: Comment link has been copied to clipboard

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.message: This project is not public and you are not a member or owner of this project.

projectMembers.title: Members of {projectName}
projectMembers.description: Manage project members and their roles. Only the owner can add or remove members.
projectMembers.noMembers: No members in this project yet.
projectMembers.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the project?

success.memberRemovedDescription: The member has been removed from the project

inviteLink.label: Anyone on the web with this link
inviteLink.confirmRegenerate: Are you sure you want to regenerate this link? The old link will stop working.
inviteLink.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this invite link?

success.deactivatedDescription: This link will no longer work
success.regeneratedDescription: A new invite link has been generated
success.copiedDescription: You can now share this link with others

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.privateDescription: You can invite members to this project by sharing an invite link.
visibility.publicDescription: Anyone on the web can view this project.

publicInfo.title: Invite links are disabled
publicInfo.description: Make the project private to create and manage invite links.

createForm.label: Anyone on the web with this link

inviteLinks.title: Invite Links
inviteLinks.noLinks: No invite links yet. Create one to invite members to this project.
inviteLinks.regenerateConfirm: Are you sure you want to regenerate this link? The old link will stop working.
inviteLinks.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this invite link?

success.linkCreatedDescription: You can now share this link with others
success.linkDeactivatedDescription: This link will no longer work
success.linkRegeneratedDescription: A new invite link has been generated
